answers.answer: Maybe you are just stressed out, or your body is trying to fight off an illnes before it starts.

HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!If you are a female, then once a month feeling feverish early in morning can be due to ovulation. Otherwise, it can be due to dehydration, thyroid issues, diabetes, adrenal gland issues etc but then you would feel the temperature fluctuations more often. Take care!

question: I'm feeling feverish only in the early morning at around 5-5.30,once in a month I'm experiencing like this,so far I got 2 times,I was not affected by any recent illness,can you suggest me regarding this.
title: feverish only in the early morning
